author: robocopsgonemad
content: when `ForkchoiceUpdatedV2 then ForkchoiceUpdatedV3 Valid Payload Building Requests (Cancun)` makes its first fcuv2 call during cancun, it is sending `"parentBeaconBlockRoot":null` and expecting success, which seems wrong?

author: m.kalinin
content: shouldn't it send fcuv3 in the case of Cancun instead?

author: robocopsgonemad
content: the tests seem to be accomodating CLs sending the last shanghai fcu to v2 but asking to build a cancun block

author: m.kalinin
content: It is expected that an EL sends an error in this case, the spec: https://github.com/ethereum/execution-apis/blob/main/src/engine/cancun.md#update-the-methods-of-previous-forks

author: robocopsgonemad
content: i see that all clients are timing out on `In-Order Consecutive Payload Execution (Cancun)` and `Re-Org Back into Canonical Chain (Depth: 10), Execute Side Payload on Re-Org (Cancun)` - should I expect that test to change soon, or work on getting it to pass as is?

author: marioevz
content: I'll give it a look to see if it's test related üëç
